name: SubscribeIncidentNotifications
description:
Subscribe entities to incident status update notifications.

This tool subscribes specified entities to receive notifications about updates to an incident's status. It requires the `subscribers.write` OAuth scope.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource to subscribe entities for notification updates.

parameters.name: version_accept_header
parameters.description: Specify the API version using the 'Accept' header for versioning purposes. This should be a string indicating the desired version format, such as 'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2'.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: entities_to_subscribe
parameters.description: A JSON object specifying entities to subscribe. Includes subscriber_id and subscriber_type (user or team).

subscriber_id.description: The ID of the entity being subscribed

subscriber_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.
